roleIds.member: Your Member Role (of minecraft server members)
roleIds.admin: your admin/moderator role (users, that should be able to use /info user

channelIds.general: channelId where the invite-link should go to (has to be a text channel)
channelIds.memberGeneral: channelId where you greet your new members

embedColor: your embed color, hexcode prefixed with '0x' (example:0x35aa78)
